gobblin.data.management.copy

Interface CopyableDataset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CopyableDatasetBase, Dataset
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigBasedDataset, DummyDataset, RecursiveCopyableDataset, SubsetFilesCopyableDataset, TimestampBasedCopyableDataset

    public interface CopyableDataset
extends CopyableDatasetBase
    Dataset that supports finding CopyEntitys.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<? extends CopyEntity> getCopyableFiles(FileSystem targetFs, CopyConfiguration configuration)
      Find all CopyEntitys in this dataset.

      • Methods inherited from interface gobblin.dataset.Dataset

        datasetURN

    • Method Detail

      • getCopyableFiles

        Collection<? extends CopyEntity> getCopyableFiles(FileSystem targetFs,
                                                  CopyConfiguration configuration)
                                           throws IOException
        Find all CopyEntitys in this dataset.

        This method should return a collection of CopyEntity, each describing one work unit for distcp. The most common CopyEntity is the CopyableDataset, describing a file that should be copied to the target. See CopyableFile for explanation of the information contained in the CopyableFiles.

        Parameters:
        targetFs - target FileSystem where copied files will be placed.
        configuration - CopyConfiguration for this job. See CopyConfiguration.
        Returns:
        List of CopyEntitys in this dataset.
        Throws:
        IOException
